com.awesome.awesomefifteenpuzzle

Class FifteenPuzzle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.awesome.awesomefifteenpuzzle.FifteenPuzzle

  • public class FifteenPuzzle
extends Activity

    An Awesome Fifteen Puzzle

    The android interface of the 15-puzzle by team Awesome2.0 . The user can play the game by pressing the different tiles, he can also ask for a shuffle tha will display a shuffled puzzle computed by the webService. Finally the user could also ask for the puzzle to be solved online.
    Since:
    12/2/2016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Team Awesome 2.0

      • multipleMoves

        public void multipleMoves(int[] moves)
        This method takes a list of tiles and move them by calling moveTile(int) for each element
        Parameters:
        moves - integer array of values of tiles to be moved

      • moveTile

        public void moveTile(int number)
        moveTile calls the Board.move(int) from the board and change the display accordingly
        Parameters:
        number - value of the tile to be moved

      • updateDisplay

        public void updateDisplay(int[][] displacements,
                 int[] temp)
        updateDisplay by offsets between current state and goal state of the puzzle uses the Board.find(int) method in the Board
        Parameters:
        displacements - 2d array of number of movements of each tile from the current state to the new state
        temp - goal state of the puzzle
